question: Does brand C manufacture fireworks that can last longer than 15 seconds?

options.A: Yes, brand C has fireworks that last longer than 15 seconds
options.B: No, brand C does not have fireworks that last longer than 15 seconds
options.D: All brands have fireworks that last longer than 15 seconds
